website_summaries.verdict: Reliable and easy to use, thanks to the accessories and meter that make it simple to check your cholesterol levels at home - no lab needed.
pros: Includes a meter and 10 test strips, and can do an entire lipid panel
You don't have to draw a lot of blood to test, plus the results are fast
cons: Some users who have done the test repeatedly find the results vary greatly, sparking concerns about accuracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I didn't even know there is cholesterol meter out there. It comes with everything that you need (even battery!). It's very easy to set up and easy to use. I didn't even have to read full user's manual. I read quick guide and followed it. RFID test strip connects with cholesterol meter very fast (about 1 second?) and it's ready to use. I actually compared the result with recent blood work that I just did this week in hospital lab. Surprisingly, measurement was very accurate. Now, I can check cholesterol whenever I want without visiting the hospital! It's great product and user friendly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gumivio

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Results
customer_reviews.text: Recently, before purchasing this product, I had my cholesterol level checked at a local labcorp. The result that I had from this product was seemingly close to that of the labcorp. Also, the range of the results were narrow after multiple trials, so I think this product has a great consistency. If you have problems with high cholesterol, this is a product that you can depend on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The tester can only test your total cholesterol as they have no other strips available (coming soon) is the only thing i find when i search for them. The little blood collectors do not collect as one would expect and if you can get it to collect then it wont dispense onto the test strip. I have to give myself a pretty good jab and drop the blood on the strip directly from my finger. Not sure how good the readings are, wont know that until my actual blood work at the end of the month. Sorry i dont recommend this product, not user friendly and cant measure anything but your total cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: April Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be traceable to hospital lab.
customer_reviews.text: This meter so far has correlated to my hospital lab in regards to total cholesterol. Recently had checked it just before going to doctor and the results were (198 Curo meter) / (191 hospital lab). In the middle of starting statin meds to lower cholesterol. I will continue to take weekly to see the effects of the meds. Would be great to see the HDL/LDL test strips soon. My cardiologist was not even aware that there were consumer meters available. I find that hard to believe, but that is what he told me.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Suddeth

customer_reviews.title: Mother approved.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother who has high cholesterol. My mom isn't the most tech savvy person, so I was happy to find out that this was simple enough for her to use on her own. She loves the monitor! The readings are simple and straight forward. The RFID pairing is a pretty neat feature. I'm glad I picked the Curo L5 for our family's needs. I'm going to be ordering their other test strips as soon as its available.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pham

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and consistent reading
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the clinic I used to work. This little device is easy to use once you understand how it works. Its all about getting enough blood sample from your finger and putting it on the test strip. If you want consistent reading, do it in the morning before any meals just like any blood test. I’d wish that they include other test strips and some alcohol pads with the pkg then it would have been perfect !!! I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Eunjin Sue

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Effective, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use with fast results with clear depiction of the device usage. The case and packaging it comes in as well is very sturdy and is useful. The pouch allows you to hold everything you would need to use the meter including strips and the tiny needles to poke. It says it can also do glucose tracking as well just with the proper strips. Came with cholesterol strips but planning to get some glucose ones to test it out as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jungeen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meter to help my parents keep track of their cholesterol levels between Doctor's appointments. The instruction manual was simple to follow. The meter was easy to setup and use. It comes with a handy storage case to keep everything in one place. We are very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Strips expire in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother. It arrived on time bug the strips that came with it expire in July. That's unacceptable, this thing isn't cheap so I would expect better sale, clearly they do not know about the not selling of products if its going to expire within 4mths. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Q.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Best Blood Cholesterol Test Kit ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this product. I recently got my labs done and it is very accurate to the results from the hospital. The device is so easy to use and I love it so much, I plan to get it for our parents and I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a blood cholesterol test kit. The kit comes with a box of strips and has everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Esther k.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and have yet to get a Cholesterol reading. What a waste of time and $.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not clear and concise. The device does not give sufficient feedback, in terms of troubleshooting information. I was unable to get the device to read the blood sample strip and I still don't know why because there is no dialog (feedback). The device just goes blank and does not indicate whether it is processing or if it requires further action from me or not even error message that I can lookup in the troubleshooting section. It does nothing but sits there. I don't know what is wrong or if I am doing something wrong or if the meter has an internal problem or what!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID CONSOLI

customer_reviews.title: Precise and Accurate Device that Helps me Control My Blood Sugar Levels and Cholesterol
customer_reviews.text: Very nifty device that measures my cholesterol levels in a short period of time. Was initially a little confused, but there was a good video on their youtube channel that helped me go through the process. **PRO-TIP: the capillary rods collect blood when you point them straight up and down BUT release onto the strip when pressed at an angle. (I initially thought they were faulty when trying to press it down straight, realized they are designed to prevent blood from leaking so the angle is necessary)
customer_reviews.author: Cal Mom77

customer_reviews.title: So hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I had to jab myself 5 times just to get the blood on the strip. Then when I did, I didn't get any reading. Super bummed. Also beware there is a 40% restocking fee if you return it. That is way too high.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great accurate product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for checking your cholesterol. It is as accurate as other products I've used in the hospitals. It's a great product to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Soh

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This does not work worst product I've ever bought! Hoping the seller's send me a new one or refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yuditsky

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: The device asks for set up every time I turn it on so I have to keep resetting date etc. I have followed all instructions several times but it just shuts down and doesn’t do anything the instructions state so I have been unable to test my blood having already wasted five of the ten strips! I should have taken better advice from the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Procter

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works exactly like it should. Easy to use and very accurate. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to use
customer_reviews.text: You have to use a capillary to collect blood and then if you are measuring LDL or HDL or triglycerides, you have to use it three times on all 3 segments with their profile strips. You have to poke yourself about 5 times to get enough blood. Extremely hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable with results
customer_reviews.text: I followed all instructions. Youtube instructions. Tested total cholesterol (Red strip). Tested my wife and I. Readings not consistent with past doctors reading (114 and 150 respectively). Called customer service, I was transferred to appropriate office, left message, no one returned my call. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Powell

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate plan to return it the readings are way off!!
customer_reviews.author: julio ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Meter is easy to use and gives quick results. Just what I was looking for. I’m low tech so I appreciate that it’s user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Bang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Just keep getting "lo" reading
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first day. Now I just get a reading of "lo" no matter how much blood I put on the test strip. Given that you only get 10 test strips, you don't have any to waste. Kind of infuriating. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great test kit!
customer_reviews.text: The user manual was very easy to follow and I like the feel of the meter's compact design. The portable carrying case also makes it easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Newton

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t make it work.
customer_reviews.text: I agree it is a great idea and the people are the most responsive ever. The blood collection just doesn’t work for me. A lot of money and I got no where.
customer_reviews.author: Joethesailor

customer_reviews.title: Curo L5 Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use, Wasted many expensive strips and reading fluctuate greatly from day to day. When I called tech support they were not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: It came with TC strips and matched my Quest lab test to within ~1%. The lancing pen broke immediately but that's OK. These work fine and are less hassle:
customer_reviews.author: Creon Levit

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money-Do not buy NO STAR RATING!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter to measure our Cholesterol before and after a 30 day plant-based diet project. Unfortunately, it did not work at the end of the 30 days so she does not have the data needed for her project. So disappointing and it is too late to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sniatecki

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving product description
customer_reviews.text: While this is an easy to use unit, the product description is completely misleading. Turns out this only ships with the total cholesterol strips, and there are no Profile Test (LDL, TC, HDL, TG) Strips available at this point via Amazon, need to purchase via the Curo website at a cost of ANOTHER $39 (+tax). Seems there are other products out there with all capabilities included. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Moore

customer_reviews.title: Glucose Strips
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed! The glucose strips are almost next to impossible to find for purchase. This machine is only for cholesterol and not as advertised since the other strips are not available for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Myrline Remy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but need enough blood for test.
customer_reviews.text: I truly like this device! I actually went to doctor after fasting for 12 hours had blood drawn, results back 150 total, and device had 135 after 17 hours of fasting. So somewhat accurate.
customer_reviews.author: B Jammin

customer_reviews.title: Took 2 tries to get it right and the test strips are $3.00 each
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to see the clear plastic blood stick in the photos. The finger sticker doesn't work as well as the one I have for my Glucose Test Kit so I used that to get a blood sample. You may have a video on how to use it, but I didn't find it. After my second attempt, I am confident I will be able to use this product to test my Cholesterol once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brown

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I had my cholesterol check about a month prior to purchasing. It was 293. I have been on a statin and changed my diet. The results reported 130. I find that hard to believe. I will see in a few months when I go for labs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves to use it and the test results seem pretty accurate. Like it so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Miyun Im

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The item is easy to use an arrive on time
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Can't measure cholesterol. It looks like you have to collect a lot of blood in order to measure cholesterol. If you cant' collect good quantity of blood the machine doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Nelly B.

customer_reviews.title: It's not accurate and after service is not available.
customer_reviews.text: I used this one for cholesterol total. the result difference about 60 from real lab tests result. I tried to call and ask a question. but no one answered the call.
customer_reviews.author: Joon Jang

customer_reviews.title: It’s not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom she had a stroke and she just got discharged from the hospital and I tried on her and it’s nothing like her results from labs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anz

customer_reviews.title: Accurate listing
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use the product yet. But, everything looks as listed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sprissler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Readings are 200 pts lower than lab test. Instructions are confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Deborrah A. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The strips expire in a month. That should be fixed. I just need to check my Chlo monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product once you understand it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Instructions need help it is very difficult to understand the steps and the process and the container against the device to program the code and the little spoon to collect blood and the stripe. I think you need a WAY BETTER and DETAILED easy steps to get the device ready but once you get it done it's very simple I did not use the little spoon I dropped the blood directly into the stripe and the reading was spot on match with the one from the lab so now I trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Docta

customer_reviews.title: Empowering but needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic idea, but I was unable to get consistent results even when following instructions precisely. There was a variance of 70 points on the TC test. Also at the time of this review TG and HDL tests are not currently available.
customer_reviews.author: David Levy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and does not work accurately
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money. I tested at home and then immediately at the clinic. The total cholesterol was close to similar, but the LDL never calculated, just read "HI", which is supposed to reflect a number that is outside of measurable range. My LDL at the clinic was 102 - well within healthy range. It almost never calculated HDL or LDL any of the times I tested. I don't know if my unit was just defective, but found it completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N

customer_reviews.title: terrible product do not buy
customer_reviews.text: ordered. fasted for test. test did not work. unit non operative. batteries getting hot. fire hazard amazon sent a second unit, fasted for test, unit did not work, batteries getting hot. unit wouldnt ever turn on two bad units. 4 wasted days run the other way from the unit
customer_reviews.author: Alaya

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I had my labwork drawn the same day i did the home testing. home was 158, 202 tested on two different fingers. labwork 276. usually i can follow directions but as the results were so far off it has to be user error.
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: don't buy. Only Total Cholesterol. useless
customer_reviews.text: You need HDL vs. LDL. This set gives strips for ONLY total without the distinction. And refill test strips are over 100...bucks!! other brands give you strips for to distinguish HDL and LDL for much less
customer_reviews.author: moon11

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-use, and pretty straightforward. It does its job well and more importantly it gives you the results fast. I would recommend it, easy 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Oppa

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD VERY HARD TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get a reading 6 times 6 stirps, many,many finger sticks some with vendor. I never got a reading. I have returned the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Fanella

customer_reviews.title: Refund shorted by 50.00
customer_reviews.text: Item did not come with everything... it is useless..... too bad I couldn't give negative stars. Did not refund the amount paid... shorted me 50.00
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: No test strips
customer_reviews.text: This includes test strips for total cholesterol readings but not the test strips to break down of cholesterol into LDL HDL TRI. Those test strips are unavailable. As is, this is of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dabbyx9

product_meta.title: Blood Total Cholesterol Test Kit - Curo L5 Digital Meter - (10 Total Cholesterol Strips Included)
feature_bullets: ✅PLEASE NOTE: Because this is an IVD Product (Medical Device), please ensure to carefully read and follow the user manual and instructions in order to get the most consistent and accurate results
✅It is recommended to measure after a minimum of 8 to 10 hours of fasting (recommended time is in the morning) after waking up
Capable of screening lipid profile including Total Cholesterol, HDL, and Triglycerides
Lightweight / Ergonomic grip / Large and easy-to-read LCD

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
